questions.question: What property makes a set countable?

explanations.a: rational numbers can have decials but are countable
explanations.d: bijection with natural numbers makes a set countable. This way, set of real numbers isn't countalbe.

questions.question: set of all real numbers is ______

explanations.c: There are infinite number of real numbers between any two real numbers, and the can not all be mapped to natural numbers.

questions.question: what type of set can a turing machine not accept?

explanations.c: Only countable sets are turing decidable.
